text: Tahliah Debrett Barnett (born 17 January 1988), known as FKA twigs, is an English R&B; singer. She used to be called twigs. Her music has been called post-dubstep and trip-hop. She was on the cover of i-D magazine in August 2012. twigs released her first EP EP on 4 December 2012. On 1 August 2013, Twigs posted the video for her single "Water Me" on YouTube. It now has over one million views. twigs released her second extended play EP2 on 17 September 2013. It was her first release on the record label The Young Turks. Pitchfork gave it a score of 8 out of 10. In 2013 BBC put her on their Sound of 2014 list of nominees. In January 2014 BBC chose the winner. twigs' first album LP1 was released in August 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== *Twitter *YouTube Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:English singer- songwriters Category:Record producers Category:English dancers Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Gloucestershire Category:Writers from Gloucestershire Category:English R&B; singers Category:English pop singers
title: FKA Twigs
